description: Today I visited a mysterious foreigner in need. This poor Italian boy borrowed money from wrong people back at home. He wanted to start his own business but blew it and had to leave the country. Some really bad people were after him. He chose the Czech Republic as his hiding place but he had a tough time to get a job and generate any income worth mentioning. His savings were gone and he was sinking into debt. I thought he would be an easy prey for my lustful cock but I was wrong. He threw the money back at me and asked me to leave immediately! It was funny. It makes things a lot sweeter when they change their minds. I was almost out of the door when he agreed to my deal. I could barely hide my smile. He was in for a pretty rough ride.
title: Debt Dandy 241
